meeting_info.organization: City of Dallas Economic Development Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the November 12, 2024 Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Development Agreement with West End Lofts, LP
agenda_items.description: Authorize a development agreement in an amount not to exceed $49,000,000 for the West End Lofts Project.

agenda_items.title: Chapter 380 Economic Development Grant Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize a grant agreement in an amount not to exceed $500,000 with HAECO Global Engine Support, LLC.

agenda_items.title: Public Hearing on Economic Development Incentive Policy
agenda_items.description: Authorize a public hearing to receive comments regarding amendments to the Economic Development Incentive Policy.

agenda_items.title: Amendments to Development Agreement with I-20 Lancaster Development, LLC
agenda_items.description: Authorize amendments to increase the City Subsidy and other modifications related to the University Hills Phase I project.

agenda_items.title: Service Contract for Project Underwriting Services
agenda_items.description: Authorize a three-year service contract for project underwriting services.

agenda_items.title: Reaccreditation of Office of Economic Development
agenda_items.description: City of Dallas Office of Economic Development receives reaccreditation as an Accredited Economic Development Organization.

agenda_items.title: Board of Adjustment Rules of Procedure Amendments
agenda_items.description: Discussion on amendments to the Board of Adjustment Rules of Procedure.

agenda_items.title: Commercial Permits Dashboard Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Commercial Permits Dashboard.

financial_items.description: Development agreement for West End Lofts Project
Increase in City Subsidy for University Hills Phase I project
Service contract for project underwriting services
